pr_title: EQL: Integrate TOML tests for function folding

timeline.message:
EQL: Integrate TOML tests for function folding

(cherry picked from commit 5141fffaac1bcd8081b65ce835a08094ddfc7b29)

EQL: PR feedback and remove duplicate licenses
(cherry picked from commit 5a1cdf633efffd5a67d6e130df970941ecfbd67e)

EQL: Unbox case_sensitive/case_insensitive
(cherry picked from commit 96e9d84e1519a9f0b5383f8c4a89fd68bd720a50)
Change the way the expression is analyzed and folded
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch into fold-tests

timeline.bodyText: At some point it would be good to put the JTOM utilities in a central place (maybe their own project) to avoid having to have this code duplicated in various places.
timeline.author: costin
